full_summary:
# Aircraft Rental for CAF Parachute Operations 
## Tender Notice
**CB-996-69645800: W2037-25-0070/A**

**Publication Date:** July 22, 2024

**Closing Date:** July 9, 2024, 11:00 AM

**Tender Status:** Expired

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence is seeking a proposal for the rental of aircraft to support the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) parachute training operations in Ontario, specifically in Trenton.

# Key Requirements
* Duration of Services: August 22, 2024, to September 14, 2024
* Location of Services: Trenton, Ontario
* Unspsc Code: 25131600 (Civilian and commercial rotary wing aircraft)
* Procurement Method: Competitive (Selective Tendering)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

# Trade Agreements
This tender announcement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* and others.

## Important Documents
Please find the full tender notice attached to this announcement, including all details of the proposal requirements.

**Document Access:** 
You can download the attached file from the Canadian Trade Construction website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

**Contact Information:** 
Maura Archibald, Contracts Manager
Department of National Defence
Address: 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, NB, Canada E2V 4J5
Phone: (506) 422-2000
Email: CTCFmnContracts@forces.gc.ca

Please note that this is an expired tender notice.
